From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 6, 2024 13:29
To: Danylo Didenko <danylo.d@corewin.ua>
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #415485 - - "Content Remediation Session Active" does not appear in Reports [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0DHTuB:ref ]

Hi Danylo,

I consulted with our Dev team and got confirmation that the event logs "Content Remediation Session Active" log should only appear after a successful send of a file which was previously intercepted, it will not appear immediately after the remediation approval.

Can we ask the customer to test the scenario in this way please?

  1.  Transfer a file that will violate the Content Aware Protection policy.
  2.  Content Aware Policy intercepts the file transfer.
  3.  User clicks on "Authorize".
  4.  User attempts again to transfer the previously intercepted file, this time the file should be allowed to be sent by Endpoint Protector.
  5.  Only after the file was successfully sent will the event log "Content Remediation Session Active" appear under "Content Aware Report".

Please let me know the outcome of testing in the above order.



Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption

I consulted with our Dev team and got confirmation that the event logs "Content Remediation Session Active" log should only appear after a successful send of a file which was previously intercepted, it will not appear immediately after the remediation approval.

Can we ask the customer to test the scenario in this way please?

	Transfer a file that will violate the Content Aware Protection policy.
	Content Aware Policy intercepts the file transfer.
	User clicks on "Authorize".
	User attempts again to transfer the previously intercepted file, this time the file should be allowed to be sent by Endpoint Protector.
	Only after the file was successfully sent will the event log "Content Remediation Session Active" appear under "Content Aware Report".


Please let me know the outcome of testing in the above order.



Kind regards
